scripts.test-lib: asc test/lib/test.ts -o build/lib/test.wasm --bindings esm && node test/lib/test.js
scripts.make: asc lib/common/inner.ts -o inner_pre_pre.wasm --runtime stub --use abort=lib/common/type/abort --disable bulk-memory --disable mutable-globals --exportRuntime --memoryBase 10000&& wasm-opt -Oz inner_pre_pre.wasm -o inner_pre.wasm --disable-bulk-memory --disable-mutable-globals && wasm2wat inner_pre.wasm -o inner_pre.wat --inline-exports --generate-names --disable-bulk-memory --disable-mutable-globals && wat2wasm inner_pre.wat -r -o build/zkgraph_local.wasm
scripts.make-as: asc lib/common/inner.ts -o build/zkgraph_local.wasm -t build/zkgraph_local.wat --runtime stub --use abort=lib/common/type/abort --disable bulk-memory --disable mutable-globals --exportRuntime
